column1: Funeral Service  will be held on Tuesday June 23
column2: 2015 at 12 p.m. at Deliverance Straightway Holiness Church 613 Clifton Road SE Atlanta
column3: Ga. 30316 with Pastor Janet Carthon. Interment at Kennedy Memorial Gardens.  Ms. Way remains will lie in state from 11:00 a.m. until hour of service. Visitation TODAY from 12:00-8:00 p.m.
